text: avaneateappam rant yuvakkalum jayilil pravesiccu. avaril oral parannu: nan vinn pilinnetukkunnatayi svapnam kanunnu. marrearal parannu: nan enre talayil reatti cumakkukayum, ennitt atil ninn paravakal tinnukayum ceyyunnatayi nan svapnam kanunnu. nannalkk tankal atinre vyakhyanam vivariccutaru. tirccayayum nannal tankale kanunnat sadâ€Œvrttaril oralayittanâ€Œ
